item.title: My newest sig
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:15, topic:153846”][quote author=goatee link=topic=210214.msg1843417#msg1843417 date=1193339609]Also just because exe is a graphics master doesn’t mean he is right about everything. That signature is too big, full stop.
[/quote]I fail to see anywhere in this post I posted any comment towards the piece of work.[/quote]

He said “lol exe said hes seen bigger sigs its its dosent matter about the size it matter how you use it plus poeple never go over 500x300”

If you can understand that jumbled crap your name is in it and he said you said “Exe’s said he’s seen bigger and it doesn’t matter about the size”

I wasn’t directing it at you just saying he shouldn’t listen to everything he is told.

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:16, topic:153846”][quote author=goatee link=topic=210214.msg1843417#msg1843417 date=1193339609]
How about you look at the render and notice thats it’s shit quality.
[/quote]

How about you learn to identify sarcasm?[/quote]

How about it wasn’t sarcasm.

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:17, topic:153846”][quote author=goatee link=topic=210214.msg1843417#msg1843417 date=1193339609]
How about you look at the render and notice thats it’s shit quality.
[/quote]

How about you look at the size of his sig and notice it won’t make a difference when it’s shrunk to that size?[/quote]

It will make a difference you idiot. It’s a crap render.

[quote=“magewolf, post:4, topic:153846”]1Look at some tutorials, they really do help/ hey show me a link to good tutorials all the tutorials i got are bad
2If you want a drop shadow do it properly (Blending options)/ hey i am still leaning and dont no how to do that
3It’s way too big, look at other peoples signatures and make it that size, standard size is from 300 X 100 to 450 X 150/lol exe said hes seen bigger sigs its its dosent matter about the size it matter how you use it plus poeple never go over 500x300
4Make a completely different background, that looks like it’s for a bedsheet or something / i dk no how to make better backrounds[/quote]

Tutorials
Renders
Inspiration

Also just because exe is a graphics master doesn’t mean he is right about everything. That signature is too big, full stop.

item.title: My newest sig
item.dc:creator: @magewolf magewolf
item.description:
@magewolf wrote:

[quote=“nator123123, post:3, topic:153846”]Bad size, make it smaller kk?
it doesn’t look HORRIBLE, but it does need WORK.
Bad text,
Bad line thingies… (C4Ds)?
EDIT: and the last thing!
Very LQ render
LG for Low Quality[/quote]lol its the only good render i can found if u want me to get hq render then give me link

[quote=“goatee, post:2, topic:153846”]How to improve:

[ul][li]Put all of your signatures in one topic[/li]
[li]Make a completely different background, that looks like it’s for a bedsheet or something.[/li]
[li]If you want a drop shadow do it properly (Blending options)[/li]
[li]Actually do something with the render instead of just putting it there[/li]
[li]Get rid of the shit border, a 1px black stroke is fine (Make a new layer, press ctrl+a, go to edit > stroke, make a 1px solid black border)[/li]
[li]It’s way too big, look at other peoples signatures and make it that size, standard size is from 300 X 100 to 450 X 150.[/li]
[li]Look at some tutorials, they really do help[/li][/ul]

Hope I helped and don’t be a bitch if you think i was too harsh, I said what you can improve on.[/quote]
1Look at some tutorials, they really do help/ hey show me a link to good tutorials all the tutorials i got are bad
2If you want a drop shadow do it properly (Blending options)/ hey i am still leaning and dont no how to do that
3It’s way too big, look at other peoples signatures and make it that size, standard size is from 300 X 100 to 450 X 150/lol exe said hes seen bigger sigs its its dosent matter about the size it matter how you use it plus poeple never go over 500x300
4Make a completely different background, that looks like it’s for a bedsheet or something / i dk no how to make better backrounds

Read full topic

item.title: My newest sig
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

How to improve:

[ul][li]Put all of your signatures in one topic[/li]
[li]Make a completely different background, that looks like it’s for a bedsheet or something.[/li]
[li]If you want a drop shadow do it properly (Blending options)[/li]
[li]Actually do something with the render instead of just putting it there[/li]
[li]Get rid of the shit border, a 1px black stroke is fine (Make a new layer, press ctrl+a, go to edit > stroke, make a 1px solid black border)[/li]
[li]It’s way too big, look at other peoples signatures and make it that size, standard size is from 300 X 100 to 450 X 150.[/li]
[li]Look at some tutorials, they really do help[/li][/ul]

Hope I helped and don’t be a bitch if you think i was too harsh, I said what you can improve on.

Read full topic
